item.title: Game UI
item.description: UI Welcome to UI! UI is an essential part of a game, especially one where dialogue is the main component. But in my time working on Fangans I’ve noticed that UI is one of the most underutilized and often forgotten parts in projects.

item.title: Pop Up
item.description: Pop Up UI The following list are suggested assets in order to make a pop up. Image for unselected option (See Example “Yes” option) Image for Selected option (See Example “No” option) Image of the Box that contains the options Font for displaying the text (.

item.title: Title Screen
item.description: Title Screen The Title Screen, the first UI you see in a danganronpa. These different Sections of UI will house a baseline for your project the moment you get these assets going.
